name: Night Killer X
description:
This is an adventure game that allows you to become a real assassin in the dark.

As a master of stealth, you'll have to use all of your skills and supernatural abilities to take out your target and make it out alive. Your commander wants you to infiltrate the Orc's Camp and to eliminate all the sentries... and you won't want to be detected (just take our word for it). Complete the mission and be assured, your reward be as large as the bounty for your head!

Features:
* Explore challenging levels
* Encounter and eliminate various enemies
* Collect gems to upgrade your skills
* Exciting and intuitive one-handed control
* And much more.

Download for free now!

We are currently working on improving and evolving the game, so if you have any suggestions or questions feel free to contact us via our email nightkiller@boooea.com.
